short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and restore custom sessions, for example: 'Work', 'Personal', 'Development', etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily save and restore custom browser sessions!

Custom Session Saver is a convenient Chrome extension that allows you to save and restore groups of tabs, tailored to your specific needs. Whether you're working, browsing for personal interests, or developing projects, this extension helps you organize and manage your tabs efficiently.

Features:

Save Sessions:

Quickly save all open tabs in your current window to a named session.
Create sessions for different activities, such as 'Work', 'Personal', 'Development', and more.
Restore Sessions:

Easily restore a saved session with a single click.
Open all the tabs in a saved session exactly as they were when you saved them.
Manage Sessions:

View a list of all your saved sessions.
Delete sessions you no longer need with ease.
How to Use:

Save a Session:

Click on the Custom Session Saver icon in the toolbar.
Enter a name for your session in the popup.
Click the "Save Session" button to save all current tabs.
Restore a Session:

Click on the Custom Session Saver icon in the toolbar.
Find the session you want to restore from the list in the popup.
Click the "Open" button next to the session name to restore all its tabs.
Delete a Session:

Click on the Custom Session Saver icon in the toolbar.
Find the session you want to delete from the list in the popup.
Click the "Delete" button next to the session name to remove it.
Why Use Custom Session Saver?

Productivity: Keep your work, personal, and project-related tabs separate and organized.
Convenience: Easily switch between different sets of tabs without losing your place.
Efficiency: Save time by quickly opening all tabs related to a specific task or interest.
Start organizing your browsing experience with Custom Session Saver today!
